title: Havin issues with links
body:
The help desk zendesk riotgames.zendesk.com sent me email with this http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/25069911 but i cant open it it want me to log in i do on my second account then it says
OOPS
The page you were looking for doesn't exist

You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved

Take me back to the home page
So i cant open my ticket its about my other stolen account stolen from 2014

replies.body: Any ticket responses received will be presented through email as well as the ticketing site.  You'll want to make sure you are logged into the account you sent the ticket from, but you can also view _and reply _to the ticket through email.  If you still have any issues and need help updating information, you can use our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which does not require a login.  Let me know if that clears things up!
